page_content: Refunds are available within 30 days of delivery for eligible products.
To return a product, go to 'My Orders' and select 'Return Item'.
Refunds will be credited to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Some products are not eligible for return, including perishable goods, software, and personalized items.
You can reset your password by clicking 'Forgot Password' on the login page.
We accept Visa, Mastercard, UPI, Netbanking, and major wallets as payment.
Orders can be cancelled before they are shipped from the seller.
Shipping usually takes 2-5 business days within India and 7-15 business days for international orders.
We offer a 1-year warranty on electronic items and 6 months warranty on accessories.
Our customer support is available 24/7 via chat, phone, and email.
You can track your order in the 'My Orders' section of your account.
If your payment fails, try another method or contact your bank for support.
Cash on Delivery (COD) is available for select products and regions.
Gift cards and coupons can be applied during checkout in the payment section.
If you were charged but did not receive order confirmation, the payment will be refunded automatically within 5-7 business days.
Products must be returned in their original packaging with all accessories included.
Exchange is available for clothing, shoes, and accessories if the size or color does not fit.
If a product is damaged on arrival, report it within 48 hours to receive a replacement or refund.
Digital products and subscriptions cannot be refunded once activated.
Refund timelines may vary depending on the payment method used (credit card, UPI, wallet, etc.).
You can update your name, phone number, and shipping addresses in 'Account Settings'.
Two-factor authentication can be enabled to secure your account.
If you suspect unauthorized access, change your password immediately and contact support.
Loyalty points are credited after every purchase and can be redeemed during checkout.
Email and SMS notifications can be managed under 'Communication Preferences'.
Same-day delivery is available in select cities for eligible products.
Delivery delays may occur during peak sale events, holidays, or due to natural events.
For international orders, customs duties and taxes may apply as per local regulations.
Bulk and wholesale orders are handled separately through our B2B team.
Warranty claims are handled directly by the manufacturer unless stated otherwise in the product description.
